context.rdfs:comment: A recipe. For dietary restrictions covered by the recipe, a few common restrictions are enumerated via suitableForDiet. The keywords property can also be used to add more detail.
context.rdfs:label: Recipe

properties.rdfs:comment: The quantity produced by the recipe (for example, number of people served, number of servings, etc).
properties.rdfs:label: recipeYield

properties.rdfs:comment: The category of the recipeâ€”for example, appetizer, entree, etc.
properties.rdfs:label: recipeCategory

properties.rdfs:comment: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.
properties.rdfs:label: recipeIngredient

properties.rdfs:comment: A step in making the recipe, in the form of a single item (document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.
properties.rdfs:label: recipeInstructions

properties.rdfs:comment: The cuisine of the recipe (for example, French or Ethiopian).
properties.rdfs:label: recipeCuisine

properties.rdfs:comment: The time it takes to actually cook the dish, in ISO 8601 duration format.
properties.rdfs:label: cookTime

properties.rdfs:comment: The method of cooking, such as Frying, Steaming, ...
properties.rdfs:label: cookingMethod

properties.rdfs:comment: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.
properties.rdfs:label: ingredients
